about_the_game:
Tower One is a tower defense game where your towers gain experience and level up by defeating the monsters that come running through the path towards your village.

Each tower gains stat points (damage, attack speed, range, splash), and skill points (slow, crit, fire, etc.) when leveling up, and you choose to upgrade whatever you want.

All buildings (tower, village, houses, farms, tombs, corpses, planted trees, etc.) also level up and have their own stats and skills.

Balance spending resources into towers or building your economy (houses, farms, get the merchant, implement taxes on your poor villagers, etc.).

When a mob reaches the village you loose lives, and a corpse appears on the map that we can plant a tree on it (unique towers which level up or 'grow' on their own) or bury it to convince his soul to help up as a friendly ghost on our battle.

Can you get to and destroy the final boss?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Any x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: How long would you last before the invading monsters destroy and eat everyone in the village!!? Build towers!, build houses!, plant trees!, build tombs for the deceased so they can still help defend as friendly ghosts!, and survive the endless waves of monsters!
